eventShortDescription: The Undead Lords were born, freed from the shackles of life, by Myrkul's will on this historic day of days.
eventLongDescription: The founding of the Undead Lords took place on AOL in a genre defining game, Neverwinter Nights. Based on the SSI Gold Box series of Dungeons and Dragons games, NWN was the first graphical MMO to exist and a fitting launching pad for UDL.
